subtitle: Hearings before the Committee on Military Affairs, House of Representatives, Seventy-seventh Congress, second session, on H.R. 7029, a bill to amend the Soldiers' and sailors' civil relief act of 1940 to extend the relief and benefits provided therein to certain persons, to include certain additional proceedings and transactions therein, to provide futher relief for persons in military service, to change certain insurance provisions therof, and for other purposes.
title: Soldiers' and sailors' civil relief act.
subjects: Insurance, Life -- United States -- War risks

notes.value:
Available also in microform in CIS US congressional committee hearings, accession number (77)H959-6.
Andrew J. May, chairman.
